function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of geographical analysis of health and safety violations in certain states","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the distribution of health and safety violations, leading to potential unaddressed risks in specific regions.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough geographical analysis of health and safety violations in all states to ensure comprehensive understanding and targeted intervention.","Technologies":"Geographic Information Systems (GIS) mapping software for spatial analysis.","People":"Public health officials, safety organizations, regulatory agencies, and policymakers.","Owner":"Public health departments, regulatory agencies, and safety organizations."},{"Description":"Fluctuating trends in construction-related complaints over time","Impact":"Unpredictable patterns of construction-related complaints may indicate shifting risk factors and inconsistent enforcement of safety measures.","Mitigation":"Implement continuous monitoring of construction-related complaints over time to identify emerging trends and take proactive measures.","Technologies":"Data analytics tools for trend analysis and prediction.","People":"OSHA, construction industry professionals, public health officials.","Owner":"OSHA, regulatory agencies, and construction industry stakeholders."},{"Description":"High concentration of complaints in specific states","Impact":"Uneven distribution of complaints may signal localized health and safety issues requiring targeted intervention and regulatory enforcement.","Mitigation":"Targeted inspection and enforcement measures in states with high complaint concentrations to address localized health and safety risks.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools for targeted intervention planning.","People":"OSHA, public health agencies, construction industry stakeholders.","Owner":"OSHA, regulatory agencies, and public health departments."}]}
